content: Ventionex specializes in offering turnkey physical and cybersecurity solutions for critical infrastructure. Currently working here.

Pickles Auctions is an auction company specializing in cars, salvage, industrial and more. As a software engineer intern in the IT department, I had the opportunity to work on various projects. During my time at Pickles, I worked as a mobile application tester and web developer. As a mobile tester, I tested and debugged the mobile application to ensure its seamless functionality. On the other hand, as a web developer, I collaborated with the team to create a captivating web application for the company. Leveraging technologies such as React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, we delivered a user-friendly and visually appealing web experience. My time at Pickles not only provided me with invaluable technical skills but also taught me the importance of teamwork and communication.
